analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol:
	Contract Spartan has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol#219)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Different versions of Solidity is used in /unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol:
	- Version used: ['^0.4.0', '^0.4.18']
	- /unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol#1 declares pragma solidity^0.4.18
	- /unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol#236-237 declares pragma solidity^0.4.0

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol#1): it allows old versions
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (/unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol#236-237): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol#89) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_numProposals' of Ballot.Ballot (/unique_chucks/28/0x93436e80d723e0dd8be9c1b35dc9fd74f346f193.sol#248-249) is not in mixedCase
